thread.title: Silvia Hart
thread.title_full: Euroflorist Deutschland bewertet von Silvia Hart

author: Silvia Hart
title: Silvia Hart
text: Was looking for flowers for my Moms 80's birthday but am in the US and she's in Germany, your Company made it easy and fast . She was very surprised and said the flowers are excellent and it was a big bouquet, i got her a medium size, of pretty roses and such . Will for sure use you more often ! Also the delivery was fast and easy ,i had just ordered them the day before with a 6 hour time difference.
